testsuite.name: com.bookstore.usermanagement.controller.UserControllerTest

testcase.name: addUser should return 400 when request is invalid()

deleteUser should return 404 when user not found()

testcase.name: deleteUser should return 204 when user deleted successfully()
updateUser should return updated user when successful()
listUsers should return list of users()
updateUser should return 404 when user not found()
addUser should return 201 and user response when user created successfully()
